channel.title: 2025-03-13s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-03-13s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Reangle-A-Video: 4D Video Generation as Video-to-Video Translation
item.description: Reangle-A-Video generates synchronized multi-view videos from a single video via video-to-video translation, surpassing existing methods without specialized 4D training.

item.title: TPDiff: Temporal Pyramid Video Diffusion Model
item.description: TPDiff accelerates video diffusion by progressively increasing frame rates during diffusion, optimizing computational efficiency with a novel stage-wise training strategy.

item.title: GTR: Guided Thought Reinforcement Prevents Thought Collapse in RL-based VLM Agent Training
item.description: GTR: Prevents thought collapse in RL-based VLM agents by process guidance, enhancing performance in complex visual reasoning tasks.

item.title: Motion Anything: Any to Motion Generation
item.description: Motion Anything: control human motion generation with multimodal conditions like text and music.

item.title: WildIFEval: Instruction Following in the Wild
item.description: WILDIFEVAL: Instruction Following in the Wild.

item.title: Multi Agent based Medical Assistant for Edge Devices
item.description: On-device multi-agent system overcomes privacy/latency issues in healthcare, enabling personalized, scalable AI assistance.

item.title: More Documents, Same Length: Isolating the Challenge of Multiple Documents in RAG
item.description: More documents can hurt RAG performance, even with same length!
